name: BOOM (WolvenBolt)
description:
Stuck in an alternate reality, you are kept on your toes from unknown foes and must reach the portal back home.

Tile Maps:  https://opengameart.org/content/whispers-of-avalon-grassland-tileset

Particle Effects:  Unity store asset pack Cartoon FX Free by Jean Moreno https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565

Sound Effects:  freesoundeffects.com

Music:  Custom made, but inspired by Luminous Sword from SAO.
